arts.sum: In the 2024/25 Serie A season, Riccardo Orsolini scored against Genoa in both the first leg at Marassi (a 2-2 draw) and the return leg in Bologna (a 1-3 victory for the Ligurian side). Lorenzo Venturino, a Genoa forward born in 2006, scored a brace in Bologna on the final day of the 2024/25 Serie A season.

arts.ttl: Bologna vs. Genoa - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Serie A clash between Bologna and Genoa, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
